mapper.sql: id, coursetitle, coursesort, coursetype, coursebrief, pickey, coursecontent, classroomid, uploaduserid, createuserid, isdel, isdefault, fileurl, sourcekey, duration, createtime, udpatetime, isup,teachingtypes,starttime,endtime,status, daytime, liveid, chapterid, chaptertitle
mapper.select: select max(coursesort) from classroom_courses where classroomid = #{classroomid} and isdel = 0 and isup = 1

select
from classroom_courses where classroomid = #{classroomid} and isdel = 0 and pickey != '' and isup = 1 and teachingtypes = 1 and (status = 0 or status = 1) and (starttime < #{startdate} or endtime > #{enddate}) ORDER BY starttime ASC limit 1

select
from classroom_courses where classroomid = #{classroomid} and isdefault = 1
mapper.insert: insert into classroom_courses (id, coursetitle, coursesort, coursetype, coursebrief, pickey, coursecontent, classroomid, uploaduserid, createuserid, isdel, isdefault, fileurl, sourcekey, duration, createtime, udpatetime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coursetitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coursesort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coursetype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{coursebrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pickey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coursecontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classroomid}, #{uploaduserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createuserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isdel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isdefault,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fileurl}, #{sourcekey}, #{duration}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{udpatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update classroom_courses
coursetitle = #{coursetitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
coursesort = #{coursesort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
coursetype = #{coursetype,jdbcType=CHAR},
coursebrief = #{coursebrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pickey = #{pickey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
coursecontent = #{coursecontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=CHAR},
isdefault = #{isdefault,jdbcType=CHAR},
fileurl = #{fileurl},
sourcekey = #{sourcekey},
duration = #{duration},
udpatetime = #{udpatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
starttime = #{starttime},
endtime = #{endtime},
chapterid = #{chapterid},
chaptertitle = #{chaptertitle},
status = #{status}
where classroomid = #{classroomid} and id = #{id}

update classroom_courses set coursetitle = #{coursetitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coursesort = #{coursesort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coursetype = #{coursetype,jdbcType=CHAR}, coursebrief = #{coursebrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pickey = #{pickey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coursecontent = #{coursecontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classroomid = #{classroomid}, uploaduserid = #{uploaduserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, createuserid = #{createuserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=CHAR}, isdefault = #{isdefault,jdbcType=CHAR}, fileurl = #{fileurl}, sourcekey = #{sourcekey}, duration = #{duration}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, udpatetime = #{udpatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where classroomid = #{classroomid} and id = #{id}
update classroom_courses set status = #{status} where classroomid = #{classroomid} and isdel = 0 and pickey != '' and isup = 1 and teachingtypes = 1 and (status = 0 or status = 1)
mapper.select: select count(*) from classroom_courses where classroomid = #{classroomid} and chapterid is null

select
from classroom_courses where classroomid = #{classroomid} and chapterid = #{chapterid} and isup = 1 order by coursesort asc, createtime desc
